20 | |     import "foo.proto";
   | |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ this import...
21 | |     import public "foo.proto";
...  |
25 | | }
   | \_- ...cannot be declared within this message definition

   |
19 | / message M {
20 | |     import "foo.proto";
21 | |     import public "foo.proto";
   | |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ this public import...
22 | |     import weak "foo.proto";
...  |
25 | | }
   | \_- ...cannot be declared within this message definition

22 | |     import weak "foo.proto";
   | |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ this weak import...

25 | | }
